title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 105.2 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 105.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations
(a) The
prohibitions of Part 51 of this Title apply to the area. (b) Except by prior written authorization by
the regional supervisor of natural resources, no person shall: (1)
operate any motorized vehicle on the
area, except in designated parking areas; (2)
park beyond the limits of a posted quota
for vehicles, or outside of a designated parking area; (3)
build or maintain an open fire; or
(4)
discharge a firearm, except
at legally huntable wildlife. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
105.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
